## Checklist

[latest Nixpkgs manual]: https://nixos.org/manual/nixpkgs/unstable/
[latest NixOS manual]: https://nixos.org/manual/nixos/unstable/
[nixpkgs-source]: https://github.com/NixOS/nixpkgs/tree/master/doc
